data.text: Israel is an empty vine, he bringeth forth fruit unto himself:
Their heart is divided; now shall they be found faulty:
For now they shall say, We have no king,
They have spoken words, swearing falsely in making a covenant:
The inhabitants of Samaria shall fear because of the calves of Beth-aven:
It shall be also carried unto Assyria for a present to king Jareb:
As for Samaria, her king is cut off
The high places also of Aven, the sin of Israel, shall be destroyed:
O Israel, thou hast sinned from the days of Gibeah: there they stood:
It is in my desire that I should chastise them;
And Ephraim is as a heifer that is taught, and loveth to tread out the corn;
Ye have plowed wickedness, ye have reaped iniquity;
Therefore shall a tumult arise among thy people,
So shall Beth-el do unto you because of your great wickedness;
